content: संहारः {@--1@} Drawing or bringing together, collecting; अनुभवनु वेणीसंहारमहोत्सवं <ls>Ve. 6.</ls> {@--2@} Contraction, compression, abridgment. {@--3@} Withholding, drawing back, withdrawal (<ab>opp.</ab> प्रयोग or विक्षेप); प्रयोगसंह रविभक्तमंत्रं <ls>R. 5. 57</ls>, <ls n="R. 5.">45.</ls> {@--4@} Restraining, holding back. {@--5@} Destruction, especially of the universe, universal destruction. {@--6@} Close, end, conclusion. {@--7@} An assemblage, a group. {@--8@} A fault in pronunciation. {@--9@} A charm or spell for withdrawing magical weapons. {@--10@} Practice, skill. {@--11@} A division of hell.
